00064 /* Panels */
00065 
00066 void ED_clip_buttons_register(ARegionType *art)
00067 {
00068     PanelType *pt;
00069 
00070     pt = MEM_callocN(sizeof(PanelType), "spacetype clip panel gpencil");
00071     strcpy(pt->idname, "CLIP_PT_gpencil");
00072     strcpy(pt->label, "Grease Pencil");
00073     pt->draw = gpencil_panel_standard;
00074     pt->flag |= PNL_DEFAULT_CLOSED;
00075     BLI_addtail(&art->paneltypes, pt);
00076 }

00078 /********************* MovieClip Template ************************/
00079 
00080 void uiTemplateMovieClip(uiLayout *layout, bContext *C, PointerRNA *ptr, const char *propname, int compact)
00081 {
00082     PropertyRNA *prop;
00083     PointerRNA clipptr;
00084     MovieClip *clip;
00085     uiLayout *row, *split;
00086     uiBlock *block;
00087 
00088     if (!ptr->data)
00089         return;
00090 
00091     prop = RNA_struct_find_property(ptr, propname);
00092     if (!prop) {
00093         printf("%s: property not found: %s.%s\n",
00094                __func__, RNA_struct_identifier(ptr->type), propname);
00095         return;
00096     }
00097 
00098     if (RNA_property_type(prop) != PROP_POINTER) {
00099         printf("%s: expected pointer property for %s.%s\n",
00100                __func__, RNA_struct_identifier(ptr->type), propname);
00101         return;
00102     }
00103 
00104     clipptr = RNA_property_pointer_get(ptr, prop);
00105     clip = clipptr.data;
00106 
00107     uiLayoutSetContextPointer(layout, "edit_movieclip", &clipptr);
00108 
00109     if (!compact)
00110         uiTemplateID(layout, C, ptr, propname, NULL, "CLIP_OT_open", NULL);
00111 
00112     if (clip) {
00113         row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
00114         block = uiLayoutGetBlock(row);
00115         uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 0, "File Path:", 0, 19, 145, 19, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, "");
00116 
00117         row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
00118         split = uiLayoutSplit(row, 0.0, 0);
00119         row = uiLayoutRow(split, 1);
00120 
00121         uiItemR(row, &clipptr, "filepath", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
00122         uiItemO(row, "", ICON_FILE_REFRESH, "clip.reload");
00123     }
00124 }

00126 /********************* Track Template ************************/
00127 
00128 void uiTemplateTrack(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *ptr, const char *propname)
00129 {
00130     PropertyRNA *prop;
00131     PointerRNA scopesptr;
00132     uiBlock *block;
00133     rctf rect;
00134     MovieClipScopes *scopes;
00135 
00136     if (!ptr->data)
00137         return;
00138 
00139     prop = RNA_struct_find_property(ptr, propname);
00140     if (!prop) {
00141         printf("%s: property not found: %s.%s\n",
00142                __func__, RNA_struct_identifier(ptr->type), propname);
00143         return;
00144     }
00145 
00146     if (RNA_property_type(prop) != PROP_POINTER) {
00147         printf("%s: expected pointer property for %s.%s\n",
00148                __func__, RNA_struct_identifier(ptr->type), propname);
00149         return;
00150     }
00151 
00152     scopesptr = RNA_property_pointer_get(ptr, prop);
00153     scopes = (MovieClipScopes *)scopesptr.data;
00154 
00155     rect.xmin = 0; rect.xmax = 200;
00156     rect.ymin = 0; rect.ymax = 120;
00157 
00158     block = uiLayoutAbsoluteBlock(layout);
00159 
00160     scopes->track_preview_height = (scopes->track_preview_height<=UI_UNIT_Y)?UI_UNIT_Y:scopes->track_preview_height;
00161 
00162     uiDefBut(block, TRACKPREVIEW, 0, "", rect.xmin, rect.ymin, rect.xmax-rect.xmin, scopes->track_preview_height, scopes, 0, 0, 0, 0, "");
00163 }
00164 
00165 /********************* Marker Template ************************/
00166 
00167 #define B_MARKER_POS            3
00168 #define B_MARKER_OFFSET         4
00169 #define B_MARKER_PAT_DIM        5
00170 #define B_MARKER_SEARCH_POS     6
00171 #define B_MARKER_SEARCH_DIM     7
00172 #define B_MARKER_FLAG           8
00173 
00174 typedef struct {
00175     int compact;                                /* compact mode */
00176 
00177     MovieClip *clip;
00178     MovieClipUser *user;                        /* user of clip */
00179     MovieTrackingTrack *track;
00180 
00181     int framenr;                                /* current frame number */
00182     float marker_pos[2];                        /* position of marker in pixel coords */
00183     float track_pat[2];                         /* position and dimensions of marker pattern in pixel coords */
00184     float track_offset[2];                      /* offset of "parenting" point */
00185     float track_search_pos[2], track_search[2]; /* position and dimensions of marker search in pixel coords */
00186     int marker_flag;                            /* marker's flags */
00187 } MarkerUpdateCb;
00188 
00189 static void to_pixel_space(float r[2], float a[2], int width, int height)
00190 {
00191     copy_v2_v2(r, a);
00192     r[0] *= width;
00193     r[1] *= height;
00194 }
00195 
00196 static void marker_update_cb(bContext *C, void *arg_cb, void *UNUSED(arg))
00197 {
00198     MarkerUpdateCb *cb = (MarkerUpdateCb*) arg_cb;
00199     MovieTrackingMarker *marker;
00200 
00201     if (!cb->compact)
00202         return;
00203 
00204     marker = BKE_tracking_ensure_marker(cb->track, cb->framenr);
00205 
00206     marker->flag = cb->marker_flag;
00207 
00208     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_MOVIECLIP|NA_EDITED, NULL);
00209 }
00210 
00211 static void marker_block_handler(bContext *C, void *arg_cb, int event)
00212 {
00213     MarkerUpdateCb *cb = (MarkerUpdateCb*) arg_cb;
00214     MovieTrackingMarker *marker;
00215     int width, height, ok = FALSE;
00216 
00217     BKE_movieclip_get_size(cb->clip, cb->user, &width, &height);
00218 
00219     marker = BKE_tracking_ensure_marker(cb->track, cb->framenr);
00220 
00221     if (event == B_MARKER_POS) {
00222         marker->pos[0] = cb->marker_pos[0]/width;
00223         marker->pos[1] = cb->marker_pos[1]/height;
00224 
00225         /* to update position of "parented" objects */
00226         DAG_id_tag_update(&cb->clip->id, 0);
00227         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SPACE|ND_SPACE_VIEW3D, NULL);
00228 
00229         ok = TRUE;
00230     }
00231     else if (event == B_MARKER_PAT_DIM) {
00232         float dim[2], pat_dim[2];
00233 
00234         sub_v2_v2v2(pat_dim, cb->track->pat_max, cb->track->pat_min);
00235 
00236         dim[0] = cb->track_pat[0] / width;
00237         dim[1] = cb->track_pat[1] / height;
00238 
00239         sub_v2_v2(dim, pat_dim);
00240         mul_v2_fl(dim, 0.5f);
00241 
00242         cb->track->pat_min[0] -= dim[0];
00243         cb->track->pat_min[1] -= dim[1];
00244 
00245         cb->track->pat_max[0] += dim[0];
00246         cb->track->pat_max[1] += dim[1];
00247 
00248         BKE_tracking_clamp_track(cb->track, CLAMP_PAT_DIM);
00249 
00250         ok = TRUE;
00251     }
00252     else if (event == B_MARKER_SEARCH_POS) {
00253         float delta[2], side[2];
00254 
00255         sub_v2_v2v2(side, cb->track->search_max, cb->track->search_min);
00256         mul_v2_fl(side, 0.5f);
00257 
00258         delta[0] = cb->track_search_pos[0] / width;
00259         delta[1] = cb->track_search_pos[1] / height;
00260 
00261         sub_v2_v2v2(cb->track->search_min, delta, side);
00262         add_v2_v2v2(cb->track->search_max, delta, side);
00263 
00264         BKE_tracking_clamp_track(cb->track, CLAMP_SEARCH_POS);
00265 
00266         ok = TRUE;
00267     }
00268     else if (event == B_MARKER_SEARCH_DIM) {
00269         float dim[2], search_dim[2];
00270 
00271         sub_v2_v2v2(search_dim, cb->track->search_max, cb->track->search_min);
00272 
00273         dim[0] = cb->track_search[0]/width;
00274         dim[1] = cb->track_search[1]/height;
00275 
00276         sub_v2_v2(dim, search_dim);
00277         mul_v2_fl(dim, 0.5f);
00278 
00279         cb->track->search_min[0]-= dim[0];
00280         cb->track->search_min[1]-= dim[1];
00281 
00282         cb->track->search_max[0]+= dim[0];
00283         cb->track->search_max[1]+= dim[1];
00284 
00285         BKE_tracking_clamp_track(cb->track, CLAMP_SEARCH_DIM);
00286 
00287         ok = TRUE;
00288     }
00289     else if (event == B_MARKER_FLAG) {
00290         marker->flag = cb->marker_flag;
00291 
00292         ok = TRUE;
00293     }
00294     else if (event == B_MARKER_OFFSET) {
00295         float offset[2], delta[2];
00296         int i;
00297 
00298         offset[0] = cb->track_offset[0] / width;
00299         offset[1] = cb->track_offset[1] / height;
00300 
00301         sub_v2_v2v2(delta, offset, cb->track->offset);
00302         copy_v2_v2(cb->track->offset, offset);
00303 
00304         for (i = 0; i < cb->track->markersnr; i++)
00305             sub_v2_v2(cb->track->markers[i].pos, delta);
00306 
00307         /* to update position of "parented" objects */
00308         DAG_id_tag_update(&cb->clip->id, 0);
00309         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SPACE|ND_SPACE_VIEW3D, NULL);
00310 
00311         ok = TRUE;
00312     }
00313 
00314     if (ok)
00315         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_MOVIECLIP|NA_EDITED, cb->clip);
00316 }
00317 
00318 void uiTemplateMarker(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *ptr, const char *propname, PointerRNA *userptr, PointerRNA *trackptr, int compact)
00319 {
00320     PropertyRNA *prop;
00321     uiBlock *block;
00322     uiBut *bt;
00323     PointerRNA clipptr;
00324     MovieClip *clip;
00325     MovieClipUser *user;
00326     MovieTrackingTrack *track;
00327     MovieTrackingMarker *marker;
00328     MarkerUpdateCb *cb;
00329     const char *tip;
00330 
00331     if (!ptr->data)
00332         return;
00333 
00334     prop = RNA_struct_find_property(ptr, propname);
00335     if (!prop) {
00336         printf("%s: property not found: %s.%s\n",
00337                __func__, RNA_struct_identifier(ptr->type), propname);
00338         return;
00339     }
00340 
00341     if (RNA_property_type(prop) != PROP_POINTER) {
00342         printf("%s: expected pointer property for %s.%s\n",
00343                __func__, RNA_struct_identifier(ptr->type), propname);
00344         return;
00345     }
00346 
00347     clipptr = RNA_property_pointer_get(ptr, prop);
00348     clip = (MovieClip *)clipptr.data;
00349     user = userptr->data;
00350     track = trackptr->data;
00351 
00352     marker = BKE_tracking_get_marker(track, user->framenr);
00353 
00354     cb = MEM_callocN(sizeof(MarkerUpdateCb), "uiTemplateMarker update_cb");
00355     cb->compact = compact;
00356     cb->clip = clip;
00357     cb->user = user;
00358     cb->track = track;
00359     cb->marker_flag = marker->flag;
00360     cb->framenr = user->framenr;
00361 
00362     if (compact) {
00363         block = uiLayoutGetBlock(layout);
00364 
00365         if (cb->marker_flag & MARKER_DISABLED)
00366             tip= "Marker is disabled at current frame";
00367         else
00368             tip= "Marker is enabled at current frame";
00369 
00370         bt = uiDefIconButBitI(block, TOGN, MARKER_DISABLED, 0, ICON_RESTRICT_VIEW_OFF, 0, 0, 20, 20, &cb->marker_flag, 0, 0, 1, 0, tip);
00371         uiButSetNFunc(bt, marker_update_cb, cb, NULL);
00372     }
00373     else {
00374         int width, height, step, digits;
00375         float pat_dim[2], pat_pos[2], search_dim[2], search_pos[2];
00376         uiLayout *col;
00377 
00378         BKE_movieclip_get_size(clip, user, &width, &height);
00379 
00380         if (track->flag & TRACK_LOCKED) {
00381             uiLayoutSetActive(layout, 0);
00382             block = uiLayoutAbsoluteBlock(layout);
00383             uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 0, "Track is locked", 0, 0, 300, 19, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, "");
00384 
00385             return;
00386         }
00387 
00388         step= 100;
00389         digits = 2;
00390 
00391         sub_v2_v2v2(pat_dim, track->pat_max, track->pat_min);
00392         sub_v2_v2v2(search_dim, track->search_max, track->search_min);
00393 
00394         add_v2_v2v2(search_pos, track->search_max, track->search_min);
00395         mul_v2_fl(search_pos, 0.5);
00396 
00397         add_v2_v2v2(pat_pos, track->pat_max, track->pat_min);
00398         mul_v2_fl(pat_pos, 0.5);
00399 
00400         to_pixel_space(cb->marker_pos, marker->pos, width, height);
00401         to_pixel_space(cb->track_pat, pat_dim, width, height);
00402         to_pixel_space(cb->track_search, search_dim, width, height);
00403         to_pixel_space(cb->track_search_pos, search_pos, width, height);
00404         to_pixel_space(cb->track_offset, track->offset, width, height);
00405 
00406         cb->marker_flag = marker->flag;
00407 
00408         block= uiLayoutAbsoluteBlock(layout);
00409         uiBlockSetHandleFunc(block, marker_block_handler, cb);
00410         uiBlockSetNFunc(block, marker_update_cb, cb, NULL);
00411 
00412         if (cb->marker_flag & MARKER_DISABLED)
00413             tip= "Marker is disabled at current frame";
00414         else
00415             tip= "Marker is enabled at current frame";
00416 
00417         uiDefButBitI(block, OPTIONN, MARKER_DISABLED, B_MARKER_FLAG,  "Enabled", 10, 190, 145, 19, &cb->marker_flag,
00418             0, 0, 0, 0, tip);
00419 
00420         col = uiLayoutColumn(layout, 1);
00421         uiLayoutSetActive(col, (cb->marker_flag&MARKER_DISABLED)==0);
00422 
00423         block = uiLayoutAbsoluteBlock(col);
00424         uiBlockBeginAlign(block);
00425 
00426         uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 0, "Position:", 0, 190, 300, 19, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, "");
00427         uiDefButF(block, NUM, B_MARKER_POS, "X:", 10, 171, 145, 19, &cb->marker_pos[0],
00428             -10*width, 10.0*width, step, digits, "X-position of marker at frame in screen coordinates");
00429         uiDefButF(block, NUM, B_MARKER_POS, "Y:", 165, 171, 145, 19, &cb->marker_pos[1],
00430             -10*height, 10.0*height, step, digits, "Y-position of marker at frame in screen coordinates");
00431 
00432         uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 0, "Offset:", 0, 152, 300, 19, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, "");
00433         uiDefButF(block, NUM, B_MARKER_OFFSET, "X:", 10, 133, 145, 19, &cb->track_offset[0],
00434             -10*width, 10.0*width, step, digits, "X-offset to parenting point");
00435         uiDefButF(block, NUM, B_MARKER_OFFSET, "Y:", 165, 133, 145, 19, &cb->track_offset[1],
00436             -10*height, 10.0*height, step, digits, "Y-offset to parenting point");
00437 
00438         uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 0, "Pattern Area:", 0, 114, 300, 19, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, "");
00439         uiDefButF(block, NUM, B_MARKER_PAT_DIM, "Width:", 10, 95, 300, 19, &cb->track_pat[0], 3.0f,
00440             10.0*width, step, digits, "Width of marker's pattern in screen coordinates");
00441         uiDefButF(block, NUM, B_MARKER_PAT_DIM, "Height:", 10, 76, 300, 19, &cb->track_pat[1], 3.0f,
00442             10.0*height, step, digits, "Height of marker's pattern in screen coordinates");
00443 
00444         uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 0, "Search Area:", 0, 57, 300, 19, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, "");
00445         uiDefButF(block, NUM, B_MARKER_SEARCH_POS, "X:", 10, 38, 145, 19, &cb->track_search_pos[0],
00446             -width, width, step, digits, "X-position of search at frame relative to marker's position");
00447         uiDefButF(block, NUM, B_MARKER_SEARCH_POS, "Y:", 165, 38, 145, 19, &cb->track_search_pos[1],
00448             -height, height, step, digits, "X-position of search at frame relative to marker's position");
00449         uiDefButF(block, NUM, B_MARKER_SEARCH_DIM, "Width:", 10, 19, 300, 19, &cb->track_search[0], 3.0f,
00450             10.0*width, step, digits, "Width of marker's search in screen soordinates");
00451         uiDefButF(block, NUM, B_MARKER_SEARCH_DIM, "Height:", 10, 0, 300, 19, &cb->track_search[1], 3.0f,
00452             10.0*height, step, digits, "Height of marker's search in screen soordinates");
00453 
00454         uiBlockEndAlign(block);
00455     }
00456 }
